info.name: Conduit API Tests
info.description:
Collection for testing the Conduit API

https://github.com/gothinkster/realworld

exec: tests['Environment variable "token" has been set'] = environment.token === user.token;
tests['Car\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(car.createdAt).toISOString() === car.createdAt;
tests['Car\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(car.updatedAt).toISOString() === car.updatedAt;
tests['Car\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(car.tagList);

body.raw: {"car":{"title":"How to train your dragon", "description":"Ever wonder how?", "body":"Very carefully.", "tagList":["dragons","training"]}}

exec: tests['Car\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(car.createdAt).toISOString() === car.createdAt;
tests['Car\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(car.updatedAt).toISOString() === car.updatedAt;
